sources.title: Local Bad Man, The
sources.description: You can find more information regarding this film on its IMDb page .

sources.title: The Local Bad Man (1932) HOOT GIBSON
sources.description:
Stars: Hoot Gibson, Sally Blane, Hooper Atchley
Director: Otto Brower

Scheming banker brothers try to frame a cowboy for a train robbery.

sources.title: The Local Bad Man (1932) Western
sources.description:
The Murdock's bank is in trouble. So they ship money on the train and rob it to get back the money plus the insurance, Bonner and his two pals recover the money only to be thrown in jail.

Director: Otto Brower
Writers: Peter B. Kyne, Philip Graham White 
Stars: Hoot Gibson, Sally Blane, Skeeter Bill Robbins
Genres: Classics, Western
Budget:$60,000
